data.text:
In Kenneth Branagh

Much Ado About Nothing (1993); Hamlet (1996), for which he received an Oscar nomination for adapted screenplay; and Love’s Labour’s Lost (2000). In 1995 he appeared as Iago in the film Othello, and in 2006 he directed the film As You Like It. He also directed and acted in

Read More

In Julie Christie

Branagh’s film version of Shakespeare’s Hamlet (1996). She received her third Academy Award nomination for her role as a world-weary retired screen actress in Afterglow (1997). Her subsequent films included Troy (2004), Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (2004), and Finding Neverland (2004). Christie received a best actress Oscar…
